trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>事件的資料列的 [更新] 按鈕按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項更新資料列。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消更新作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些集合的常見方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object passed to the event-handling method to HTML-encode all values supplied by the user before updating the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理方法，以 HTML 編碼之前更新的資料來源的使用者所提供的所有值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: 要更新之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> class using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>類別使用指定的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the `rowIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的數值`rowIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示要更新之資料列中主索引鍵的欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object containing field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件，包含表示要更新之資料列中主索引鍵的欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is set, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property (dictionary) to access the value of the primary key in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項設定，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性 （字典） 來存取要更新的資料列的主索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取非索引鍵欄位的值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property contains the updated values, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property contains the original values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性包含更新的值，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性包含原始值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> dictionary is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>字典會自動填入的欄位中指定的名稱/值組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If multiple fields form the primary key, a separate entry is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> dictionary for each key field.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個欄位會形成主索引鍵，要將不同的項目加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>每個索引鍵欄位的字典。

trans-unit.source: To determine the name of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷索引鍵欄位的名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>字典。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷索引鍵欄位的值，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property to access the values of the key fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性來存取更新資料列中的索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The values are then written to a log file of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 值接著會寫入至記錄檔的更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary containing the revised values of the non-key field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含要更新之資料列中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組修訂值的字典。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object containing the revised values of the non-key field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件，包含要更新之資料列中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的修訂值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property (dictionary) to access the values of the revised non-key fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性 （字典） 來存取更新資料列中修改過的非索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The primary key field or fields are not included in this dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 主索引鍵欄位，不包含此字典中。

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the primary key field or fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取主索引鍵欄位或欄位的值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the original values of the non-key fields in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的資料列中的非索引鍵欄位的原始值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the revised non-key fields in the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性會自動填入資料列中修改過的非索引鍵欄位的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: A separate entry is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property for each non-key field in the row.
trans-unit.target: 不同的項目加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>資料列中每個非索引鍵欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷項目欄位名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>字典。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷項目值，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property to HTML-encode all values supplied by the user before updating the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>HTML 編碼的使用者所提供之前更新的資料來源的所有值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary containing the original field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含要更新之資料列中原始欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object that contains the original values of the field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件，包含要更新之資料列中欄位名稱/值組的原始值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property (dictionary) to access the original values of the fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性 （字典） 來存取更新資料列中欄位的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This dictionary contains all fields in the row except the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 此字典包含的索引鍵欄位以外的資料列中的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: The key fields are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所定義的索引鍵欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can access the key fields of the row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取資料列的索引鍵欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the revised values of the non-key fields in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取非索引鍵中之欄位的資料列修訂過的值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property is automatically populated with the original values of all the field name/value pairs in the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性會自動填入資料列中的所有欄位名稱/值組的原始值。

trans-unit.source: A separate entry is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property for each field in the row.
trans-unit.target: 不同的項目加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>資料列中每個欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷項目欄位名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=nameWithType>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>字典。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷項目值，請使用<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property to access the original values of the fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性來存取更新資料列中欄位的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The values are then written to a log file of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 值接著會寫入至記錄檔的更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得要更新之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: 要更新之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷要更新的資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index is often used to retrieve the corresponding row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, which allows you to access the row's properties.
trans-unit.target: 資料列索引通常用於擷取對應的資料列從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，可讓您存取資料列的屬性。
